rule.name: reportChartColors
rule.definition:
=#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dashboardLayout"( firstColumnContents:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_lineChartField"( label: "Line Chart", categories: {"Start", "End"}, series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Red", data: {1,1}, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: {2,2}, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: {3,3}, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: {4,4}, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: {5,5}, color: "RED") } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pieChartField"( label: "Pie Chart", series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: 1, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: 1, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED") }, showDataLabels: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_barChartField"( label: "Bar Chart", series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: 1, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: 1, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED") }, showDataLabels: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnChartField"( label: "Column Chart", series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: 1, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN", data: 1, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED", data: 1, color: "RED") }, showDataLabels: true ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}LineChart'( label: "Color Demo", instructions: "Some of these colors are specified by the designer and some are the default", categories: {"Start", "End"}, series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "BLUEGRAY (default)", data: {1,1}, color: ""), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED (specified)", data: {2,2}, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GREEN (default)", data: {3,3}, color: null), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED (specified)", data: {4,4}, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "GOLD (default)", data: {5,5}), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED (specified)", data: {6,6}, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "ORANGE (default)", data: {7,7}), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "RED (specified)", data: {8,8}, color: "RED"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "PURPLE (default)", data: {9,9}) } ), load( local!indices: {1,2,3}, local!alldata: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Active Users", data: {6500, 5300, 5500, 7000, 5200, 5000, 5750, 5600, 5800, 5200}, color: "SKYBLUE"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Mobile Users", data: {260, 280, 255, 253, 240, 230, 248, 242, 255, 250}, color: "GREEN"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Social Users", data: {null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null}, color: "YELLOW") }, with( local!somedata: index(local!alldata, local!indices), { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxFieldByIndex"( label: "Select Data", choiceLabels: local!alldata.label, value: local!indices, saveInto: local!indices ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_lineChartField"( label: "Unique Monthly Users for Aggregate Customers", xAxisTitle: "Month", yAxisTitle: "Users", yAxisMin: 0, showTooltips: false, series:somedata, categories: { "Jan 2013", "Feb 2013", "Mar 2013", "Apr 2013", "May 2013", "Jun 2013", "Jul 2013", "Aug 2013", "Sep 2013", "Oct 2013" } ) } ) )
} )
